about_the_game:
'NOWV' is a project for celebrating NingNing(a member of the South Korean idol group aespa)

Play as a character who has disability of an eye and face challenges.

It might be tough to get through, but you will finally find it possible to overcome the challenges by transforming the disability into the power of inner sight.

This project has a set progression and ending; the player will experience the following message.

'Disability even could be the power to find the answer.'

'We can overcome whatever we think it as a defect by changing our mind.'

[About Game Play]

As a puzzle game, you will face a quest.

Find the 'Real Key', and put it on the altar. You have only three chances.

If you fail, you will get into the deeper mind, where you can get a hint to find the key.

Finally, if you succeed, you can get the message of this game.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or above

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
